00022 #ifndef CONFIG_MGR_H
00023 #define CONFIG_MGR_H
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include <map>
00028 
00029 using std::string;
00030 using std::vector;
00031 using std::map;
00032 
00034 typedef enum
00035 {
00036   CFG_FILE_NOT_SPECIFIED,
00037   CFG_FILE_MISSING,
00038   CFG_FILE_FORMAT_ERROR,
00039   CFG_FILE_NOT_WRITABLE,
00040   CFG_OK
00041 } ConfigMgrStatusType;
00042 
00043 #define FEATURE_ENABLED 1
00044 #define FEATURE_DISABLED 0
00045 #define FEATURE_USE_DEFAULT -1
00046 
00048 class ConfigMgr
00049 {
00050 public:
00051   ConfigMgr();
00052   ~ConfigMgr();
00053   ConfigMgrStatusType Load(string filename);
00054   ConfigMgrStatusType Save(string filename);
00055   ConfigMgrStatusType Save();
00056   string GetInstallLogFilename() const;
00057   int GetNumRepositories() const;
00058   string GetRepositoryDirectory(int repositoryNumber) const;
00059   bool AddRepositoryDirectory(string directory);
00060   string GetStorageDirectory() const;
00061   void SetStorageDirectory(string directory);
00062   string GetWorkDirectory() const;
00063   void SetWorkDirectory(string directory);
00064   string GetInstallFileDirectory() const;
00065   void SetInstallFileDirectory(string directory);
00066   int GetNumProcessors();
00067   int GetFeatureState(string featureName);
00068   void SetFeatureState(string featureName, int state);
00069 private:
00070   void DetectNumProcessors();
00071 
00073   vector<string> mRepositoryDirectories;
00075   string mInstallLogFilename;
00077   string mStorageDirectory;
00079   string mWorkDirectory;
00081   string mInstallFileDirectory;
00083   string mCfgFilename;
00085   int mNumProcessors;
00087   map<string,bool> mFeatureSettings;
00088 };
